title: MODRY ANDEL - More than TAXI
summary: Rezervace služby TAXI, odvoz vozu či transport z/na letiště.
description: - New designWe’ve improved the look of the features you know and made the new ones almost perfect.- Photos of all drivers and their vehiclesChoose the perfect combination for your journey.- Effective communication with the customer centreWe’re always available and everything makes sense.- The option of selecting a particular driver according to ratings, photos and comments from othersFeedback is good for everyone.- Well-arranged and detailed history of journeysYou have everything under detailed control.- Manage your details for faster reservationsAlways make the right choice: Driver, vehicle, address or route.- Sharing on social networksTell your friends about the experience of your journey.- Reserve multiple vehicles at onceWe know it can come in handy.
descriptionHTML:
- New design
We’ve improved the look of the features you know and made the new ones almost perfect.

- Photos of all drivers and their vehicles
Choose the perfect combination for your journey.

- Effective communication with the customer centre
We’re always available and everything makes sense.

- The option of selecting a particular driver according to ratings, photos and comments from others
Feedback is good for everyone.

- Well-arranged and detailed history of journeys
You have everything under detailed control.

- Manage your details for faster reservations
Always make the right choice: Driver, vehicle, address or route.

- Sharing on social networks
Tell your friends about the experience of your journey.

- Reserve multiple vehicles at once
We know it can come in handy.
comments: Very useful app and quite user friendly. Please add support for Amex in the payment cards section
Great app, using it already for some while.unfortunately after the recent update I can't launch it anymore.. would appreciate some support here

CHANGE TO 5STAR - Excellent support and response on my issue below. Back to my favourite taxi service in Prague.  ----------------------------------------------------- I had been a silver member for quite some time now and have been actively using this service. But today I got an SMS that my price rates changed to basics again. I don't think I want to stay with Modrý Anděl this way...
recentChanges: Minor fixes improving stability of the app.
